description.value: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

The Dire Badger attacks with its bite.

Melee Attack - 1 Creature (5 ft.)

  • Attack Bonus: +3
  • Damage: [[/damage 1d6+1 piercing]] damage

The Dire Badger attacks with its claws.

Melee Attack - 1 Creature (5 ft.)

  • Attack Bonus: +3

  • Damage: [[/damage 2d4 + 1 slashing]] damage
You have advantage on perception checks, except where you cannot use smell. Note that when you have advantage, your passive perception increases by 5.

The dire animal's skeleton suddenly grows spikes and other protrusions, which shoot out of the animal's flesh. The dire animal enters a frenzy. While in a frenzy, the dire animal gains temporary hit points equal to its hit point maximum, and can use its multiattack as a bonus action.

The frenzy lasts 1 minute. When the frenzy ends, the animal takes damage equal to its hit point maximum as its skeleton resets. This damage cannot be reduced in any way, but is nonlethal.
